Description:
An 8K tour of UC Irvine (UCI) campus!
The university is classified among "R1: Doctoral Universities – Very high research activity", and had $436.6 million in research and development expenditures in 2018. A total of seven Nobel Prize laureates have been affiliated with UCI.

Shot and edited by: Moataz Sheha
Filmed in Irvine, California, USA

Title: UC Irvine Pros and Cons
Tags: uci,uc irvine,uc irvine pros and cons,the pros and cons of uc irvine,uci frequently asked questions,uci vlog,uci socially,uci academically,uci pros,uci cons,uci freshman,uc irvine vlog,irvine,pros and cons,university of california irvine,pros and cons of uci,uc irvine campus tour,how to get into uc irvine,uc irvine transfer,transferring to uc irvine,why i chose uc irvine,uc irvine acceptance,uc irvine faq,why uc irvine,uc irvine information,uci faq
Description:
UC Irvine Pros and Cons 
-
In today's video I talk about the Pros and the Cons of the university of California, Irvine. Many people are curious to know more about UCI and want to know about the good and the bad, so I thought this video would be perfect to make. With everything going on in the world right now, I have been staying busy and distracted and creating this youtube video and other content is an outlet for me. I separated the video into Social Cons, Academic Cons, Social Pros, and Academic Pros so that way you all have a broader perspective of UC Irvine. If you have any questions please feel free to leave them in the comment section below so that I can try an help you out!
-

Academic Cons - 3:11
